product_name: Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle - 12 fl. oz. - Boys'
long_description: The Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle for boys keeps your little biker happy and hydrated on family rides, and it features a clip you can attach his handlebar, stem or seatpost.
short_description: The Riderz Sip 'N Ride Water Bottle for boys keeps your little biker happy and hydrated on family rides, and it features a clip you can attach his handlebar, stem or seatpost.
